file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: PhoneInfoga
  version: '1.0'
  description: 'PhoneInfoga is one of the most advanced tools to scan phone numbers using only free resources. The goal is to first gather standard information such as country, area, carrier and line type on any international phone numbers with a very good accuracy. Then search for footprints on search engines to try to find the VoIP provider or identify the owner.'
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:3000/api'
    description: API URL
paths:
  /numbers:
    get:
      summary: Get saved numbers
      tags: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          headers: {}
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  numbers:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/Number'
              examples:
                Success:
                  value:
                    numbers:
                      - local: '2623'
                        E164: '+2622623'
                        international: '2622623'
                        countryCode: 262
                        country: RE
                        carrier: ''
                Error:
                  value:
                    success: false
                    message: An error occurred
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties: {}
            multipart/form-data:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties: {}
        '500':
          description: Internal Server Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
              examples: {}
      operationId: get-numbers
      description: |-
        Get all known numbers.

        This route is actually not used yet.
      parameters: []
      requestBody: {}
  '/numbers/{number}/scan/local':
    parameters:
      - schema:
          type: string
        name: number
        in: path
        required: true
    get:
      summary: Local scan
      tags: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers: {}
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  error:
                    type: string
                  result:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/LocalScanResult'
              examples:
                Success:
                  value:
                    success: true
                    error: ''
                    result:
                      local: '2623'
                      E164: '+2622623'
                      international: '2622623'
                      countryCode: 262
                      country: RE
                      carrier: ''
      operationId: get-numbers-scan-number-local
      description: ''
  '/numbers/{number}/scan/numverify':
    parameters:
      - schema:
          type: string
        name: number
        in: path
        required: true
    get:
      summary: Numverify scan
      tags: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  error:
                    type: string
                  result:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/NumverifyScanResult'
      operationId: get-numbers-number-scan-numverify
  '/numbers/{number}/scan/googlesearch':
    parameters:
      - schema:
          type: string
        name: number
        in: path
        required: true
    get:
      summary: Google search scan
      tags: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  error:
                    type: string
                  result:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/NumverifyScanResult'
      operationId: get-numbers-number-scan-googlesearch
  '/numbers/{number}/scan/ovh':
    get:
      summary: OVH Telecom scan
      tags: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  error:
                    type: string
                  result:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/OVHScanResult'
      operationId: get-numbers-number-scan-ovh
components:
  schemas:
    Number:
      title: Number
      type: object
      description: A phone number
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
        number:
          type: integer
        countryISO:
          type: integer
        country:
          type: string
        carrier:
          type: string
    ErrorResponse:
      title: ErrorResponse
      type: object
      description: Generic error response schema.
      x-examples:
        Example:
          success: false
          message: An error occurred
      properties:
        success:
          type: boolean
        message:
          type:
            - string
            - 'null'
      required:
        - success
        - message
    LocalScanResult:
      title: LocalScanResult
      type: object
      properties:
        local:
          type: string
        E164:
          type: string
        international:
          type: string
        countryCode:
          type: number
        country:
          type: string
        carrier:
          type: string
    NumverifyScanResult:
      title: NumverifyScanResult
      type: object
      properties:
        valid:
          type: boolean
        number:
          type: string
        local_format:
          type: string
        international_format:
          type: string
        country_prefix:
          type: string
        country_code:
          type: string
        country_name:
          type: string
        location:
          type: string
        carrier:
          type: string
        line_type:
          type: string
      description: ''
    GoogleSearchScanResult:
      title: GoogleSearchScanResult
      type: object
      properties:
        socialMedia:
          type: array
          uniqueItems: false
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              URL:
                type: string
              dork:
                type: string
              number:
                type: string
        disposableProviders:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              URL:
                type: string
              dork:
                type: string
              number:
                type: string
        reputation:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              URL:
                type: string
              dork:
                type: string
              number:
                type: string
        individuals:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              URL:
                type: string
              dork:
                type: string
              number:
                type: string
        general:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              URL:
                type: string
              dork:
                type: string
              number:
                type: string
    OVHScanResult:
      title: OVHScanResult
      type: object
      properties:
        found:
          type: boolean
        numberRange:
          type: string
        city:
          type: string
        zipCode:
          type: string
  securitySchemes: {}

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 201: cannot unmarshal !!seq into string
